name: 洪媽益
objective:
IMPORTANT:
Non-first year students will not be admitted to the course if absent on the first day of class.

This course aims to help students build a more powerful vocabulary on the SAT (the qualifying exam for US college admission) level, i.e. the level of proficiency of an educated native speaker's. Students will be introduced to the lexical use through story scenes. Morphological analysis of the words will be included in the course. At the exit of this course, students are expected to use them in their proper contexts and hence reach the following goals: Develop a powerful vocabulary, Learn important word roots, Avoid word usage error in context, Strengthen his/her 
writing ability, and Improve communication skills.
